41-year-old, currently Controller of BBC Global News, replaces Andy Coulson , who resigned earlier this month amid the continuing row over phone-hacking when he was editor of the News of the World. Mr David Cameron said: I am very pleased that Craig Oliver is to become the new Director of Communications at 10 Downing Street.`` Craig has formidable experience as a broadcast journalist.
